channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New York Is Grappling with Its Own Kind of Mayhem
item.description: While Trump cracks down on D.C. violence, Gotham is in a similar situation; crime is dropping, but is still too frequent and arbitrary to give residen...

item.title: 'Woefully out of balance': U.S. debt surpasses $37 trillion
item.description: The U.S. national debt has exceeded $37 trillion, raising fears that the country's sea of red ink is rising faster than expected.

item.title: A Tax Law for Manufacturers, but a Trade Policy Against Them
item.description: While the OBBBA tries to buoy manufacturing, President Trump’s tariffs are an anvil dragging the sector down.

item.title: A legal fight is playing out around a Mexican migrant activist accused of human trafficking
item.description: A legal battle is playing out in Mexico over a well-known immigration activist and lawyer who was arrested earlier this month for alleged human traffi...

item.title: No, Trump Hasn’t Gone Soft On Silicon Valley Monopolies
item.description: President Trump’s antitrust team isn’t pro-monopolies. It's pro-consumer, pro-competition, and pro-America.

item.title: Britain, France and Germany threaten to reimpose sanctions on Iran as nuclear program deadline nears
item.description: The top diplomats of Britain, France, and Germany threatened to reimpose sanctions on Iran as an end-of-the-month deadline nears for the country to re...

item.title: Beto O’Rourke Is The Political Wart That Won’t Go Away
item.description: The sugar daddy of temper-tantrum-throwing Texas Democrats appears to be ramping up for another losing political campaign.

item.title: Polanski’s Perfectly Timely J’accuse
item.description: An Officer and a Spy parallels the devastating history of the Dreyfus Affair with lawfare.

item.title: Chinese Immigrants Create 21 Children Via Surrogate Before Allegedly Abusing Them
item.description: While investigating allegations of abuse, police discovered 15 children under the age of three in the Chinese couple's L.A. mansion.

item.title: Washington, D.C., Feels Neither Safe Nor Clean Because It’s Not
item.description: When your daily life in a city is marked by a series of fearsome conversations, signs of squalor, and dangerous encounters, no rational person can cal...

item.title: What an Acceptable Russia-Ukraine Deal Might Look Like
item.description: The best that can be hoped for is an armistice with an underpinning firm enough to deter Russia from resuming its war when it is ready.

item.title: GOP Washington state Sen. John Braun is running for Democratic Rep. Marie Gluesenkamp Perez's seat
item.description: Washington state Sen. John Braun announced Tuesday that he will run next year for the Republican nomination for the U.S. House seat held by Democratic...

item.title: Drunk, Belligerent Vagrants Blockade The Federalist’s Office As Leftist Journalists Insist DC Is America’s Purest City
item.description: The squalor that those living and working in the city are forced to endure is unbecoming of the nation's capital.

item.title: Judge orders ICE to improve conditions after NYC immigration detainees complain of mistreatment
item.description: A federal judge ordered the Trump administration Tuesday to immediately improve conditions at a New York City immigration holding facility, acting on ...

item.title: Judge Declines Trump DOJ Request to Unseal Epstein Grand Jury Testimony
item.description: The Justice Department could appeal the ruling, but doing so would be foolish.
